description: Level 3 data products are variables mapped on uniform space-time grid scales and are the result of combining multiple scenes (e.g. S1/S10) to cover the user region of interest.
title: PROBA-V S1 TOC 1 km COG: Data corrected for atmospheric effects with the SMAC (Simplified Method for Atmosheric Corrections) algorithm, COG format - Collection 2
license: Products can be freely downloaded after registration / Licence: https://proba-v.vgt.vito.be/en/data-policy
